content:
You decide to pay a visit to your werewolf friends, hoping that they might have some insights into the activities of the local vampire gangs. You know that they tend to keep an eye on the streets and have connections with other supernatural creatures.

As you arrive at the werewolf's territory, you're greeted by the alpha, a powerful werewolf named Marcone. He eyes you warily, but nods in greeting when he recognizes you.

"What brings you here, Dresden?" Marcone asks, his voice low and rumbling.

"I need your help," you explain, filling him in on the situation with the vampires and the master vampire. "I was hoping you might know something about the local gangs and their activities."

Marcone considers for a moment, then nods. "We've heard some rumors about a new gang in town," he says. "They've been making a lot of noise lately, trying to muscle in on our territory. We think they might be connected to the vampires."

"Do you know anything else about them?" you ask.

Marcone shakes his head. "Not much, I'm afraid. But we'll keep an ear to the ground and let you know if we hear anything else."

You thank Marcone for his help and make your way back to the crypt, mulling over what you've learned. It's clear that the situation is getting more dangerous by the minute, and you'll need to act quickly if you want to stop the master vampire and his minions before it's too late.
